headline: Tracking David Tepper's Appaloosa Management Portfolio - Q2 2025 Update
summary: David Tepper's Q2'25 portfolio changes reveal bold bets on Whirlpool and healthcare, trimmed big tech gains, and a bullish stance on tech and healthcare trends. See more.

headline: Caesars Entertainment (CZR) Down 3.3% Since Last Earnings Report: Can It Rebound?

headline: 3 Volatile Stocks with Open Questions
summary: Volatility cuts both ways - while it creates opportunities, it also increases risk, making sharp declines just as likely as big gains. This unpredictability can shake out even the most experienced investors.
